item.title: 2001 - A Space Odyssey - A Review
item.description: I am going to assume that you have already seen this movie, and are open to discussing what would otherwise be spoilers. Turn around NOW if you have not seen this movie yet! Also, I have not yet read the books or watched the other movies, so some of my thoughts below might be divergent from what was uncovered in those later works. What a great weekend! It all started with a session on focus to fix the issues with my blog deployment - something had broken when I had deployed Hugo the last time and I hadn’t been able to fix it.
